head.title: Corporate Equity Offerings Planned for the Week

hedline.hl1: Corporate Equity Offerings Planned for the Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Account4.com Inc., Newton, Mass., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Robinson-Humphrey Co.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Account4.com Inc., Newton, Mass., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Robinson-Humphrey Co.
Applied Molecular Evolution Inc., San Diego, an initial public offering of 3.8 million shares. CIBC Wood Gundy.
Arena Pharmaceuticals Inc., San Diego, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. ING Barings.
Avici Systems Inc., North Billerca, Mass., an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Blue Martini Software Inc., San Mateo, Calif., an initial public offering of 7.5 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Camtek Ltd., Israel, an initial public offering of 5.6 million ordinary shares. CIBC Wood Gundy.
Chiles Offshore L.L.C., Houston, an initial public offering of 8 million shares. CS First Boston.
ClearWave N.V., Amsterdam, the Netherlands, an initial public offering of 10.6 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co. and Salomon Smith Barney.
Coherent Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., 3 million shares. UBS Warburg.
Convergent Group Corp., Englewood, Colo., an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Corvis Corp., Columbia, Md., an initial public offering of 27.5 million shares. CS First Boston.
Crown Castle International Corp., Houston, 11 million shares of the shelf. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and CS First Boston.
Digital United Holdings Ltd., Taiwan, an initial public offering of 10 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Discovery Partners International Inc., San Diego, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Chase H&Q.
Evoke Communications Inc., Louisville, Colo., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Gemini Genomics P.L.C., Cambridge, England, an initial public offering of 6 million American depository shares; each A.D.S. represents two ordinary shares. SG Cowen.
Genencor International Inc., Palo Alto, Calif., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Merrill Lynch & Co.
GlobeSpan Inc., Red Bank, N.J., 8 million shares. Robertson Stephens and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Illumina Inc., San Diego, Calif., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Interland Inc., Atlanta, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
inTEST Corp., Cherry Hill, N.J., 2 million shares. Needham & Co.
IntraLinks Inc., New York, an initial public offering of 4.6 million shares. J.P. Morgan Securities.
Keryx Biopharmaceuticals Inc., Jerusalem, an initial public offering of 4.6 million shares. Roth Capital Partners.
Lattice Semiconductor Corp., Hillsboro, Ore., 4 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Lexent Inc., New York, an initial public offering of 5.8 million shares. CS First Boston.
Mainspring Communications Inc., Cambridge, Mass., an initial public offering of 3.5 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Nassau Broadcasting Corp., Princeton, N.J., an initial public offering of 12.4 million class A shares, 9.9 million in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Polycom Inc., Milpitas, Calif., 2.6 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
RITA Medical Systems Inc., Mountain View, Calif., an initial public offering of 3.4 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Semitool Inc., Kalispell, Mont., 4.1 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Serono S.A., Geneva, an initial public offering of 77.9 million American depository shares; each A.D.S. represents one-fortieth of a bearer share. Merrill Lynch & Co.
SpectraSite Holdings Inc., Cary, N.C., 14.5 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Tripath Technology Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 7.5 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Tumbleweed Communications Corp., Redwood City, Calif., 3 million shares. CS First Boston.
TyCom Ltd., Pembroke, Bermuda, an initial public offering of 43.5 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and Salomon Smith Barney.
ValiCert Inc., Mountain View, Calif., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown and Merrill Lynch & Co.
WebEx Inc., San Jose, Calif., an initial public offering of 3.5 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
(Source: MCM EquityWatch.)
